body_html:
We've committed 76f6938 for the build config and I'm merging the conflicts. Some difference between that commit and this PR:

  1. We need to use macro GOOGLE_TENSORRT to guard all c++ files, see tensorrt_test.cc for an example.
  2. Bazel macro 'if_trt' now becomes 'if_tensorrt'
  3. The 'tensorrt' lib is renamed to 'nv_infer'

Meanwhile I'll try to pull in this PR locally to make sure it works, thanks.
body_text:
We've committed 76f6938 for the build config and I'm merging the conflicts. Some difference between that commit and this PR:

We need to use macro GOOGLE_TENSORRT to guard all c++ files, see tensorrt_test.cc for an example.
Bazel macro 'if_trt' now becomes 'if_tensorrt'
The 'tensorrt' lib is renamed to 'nv_infer'

Meanwhile I'll try to pull in this PR locally to make sure it works, thanks.
body:
We've committed 76f6938bafeb81a4ca41b8dac2b9c83e1286fa95 for the build config and I'm merging the conflicts. Some difference between that commit and this PR:

1. We need to use macro GOOGLE_TENSORRT to guard all c++ files, see [tensorrt_test.cc](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/tensorrt/tensorrt_test.cc#L20) for an example.
2. Bazel macro 'if_trt' now becomes 'if_tensorrt'
3. The 'tensorrt' lib is renamed to 'nv_infer'

Meanwhile I'll try to pull in this PR locally to make sure it works, thanks.
